extensionDescription.message: Automatically checks each page for AMP validation.

pageFailsValidationTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not valid AMP HTML.

pageHasAmpAltTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not an AMP HTML page, but one is available.

pageIsNotAmpTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not an AMP HTML page.

pageFromAmpCacheTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is on an AMP Cache.

pagePassesValidationTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is valid AMP HTML.

emptyResultsText.description: No errors or warnings were found.
